title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 350.5 - Premium amount to attract well-balanced exhibits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 350.5 - Premium amount to attract well-balanced exhibits

State Regulations

The amount of premium offered in the various departments
should be such as to secure well- balanced exhibits, in the light of the types
of agriculture carried on in the territory served by the
fair. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
350.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
